job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: <p><strong>Title&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</strong>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<strong>&nbsp;: Site Reliability Engineer</strong></p><p><strong>Location&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</strong>:&nbsp;<strong>Cary, NC</strong></p><p><strong>Duration&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;: 12+ Months</strong></p><p><strong>Rate&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;: OPEN&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</strong></p><p><strong>Visa Status&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;: ANY</strong></p><p><strong>&nbsp;</strong></p><p><strong>In-Person Interview&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;: No</strong></p><p><strong>Relevant Experience (in Yrs.)&nbsp;&nbsp;: 8+</strong></p><p><strong>&nbsp;</strong></p><p><strong>Detailed Job Description:</strong></p><ul><li><strong>8 Years E2E Technical Leadership -&nbsp;Reliability - Cloud, Monitoring, JAVA,</strong></li><li>Site Reliability, Monitoring, dev solutions</li><li>Expertise in various types of monitoring</li><li>familiarity with monitoring solutions for multi app, multi cloud platform, knowledge of APICA, SPLUNK, and home grown monitoring for batch, API, and distributed applications</li><li>Expertise in devops practices &amp; automation of deployments, monitoring, batch processes</li><li>Ability to identify problems in current platform, propose and drive solutions through breadth of experience</li><li>help diagnose and RCA production incidents</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong>Thanks And Regards</strong></p><p><strong>Arun Kumar Reddy&nbsp;</strong></p><p><strong>Technical Recruiter&nbsp;</strong></p><p><strong>Ascii Group LLC&nbsp;</strong></p><p><strong>Email:&nbsp;rec32@asciigroup.com </strong></p><p><strong>Phone:&nbsp;(248) 476-7600 Ext 107 | (430) 260-3565</strong></p>
